products.name: Nesquik
products.categories: Beverages, Cocoa and its products, Cocoa and chocolate powders, Instant beverages, Chocolate powders
products.facts: ["Nesquik uses high-quality cocoa sourced from sustainable farms.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Nesquik products are fortified with vitamins and minerals to enhance nutritional value.","The brand is committed to reducing its carbon footprint through eco-friendly production practices."]

products.name: Ritz Cheese Flavour
products.facts: ["Contains real cheese for authentic flavor","Made with high-quality ingredients for a satisfying crunch","Packaging is recyclable to reduce environmental impact","No artificial flavors or preservatives used, ensuring better quality"]

products.name: Meta Moon
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages, Still fruit soft drinks
products.labels: No gluten, No artificial flavors, No artificial colors, No artificial colours or flavours, No caffeine
products.facts: ["Meta Moon - 500ml is packaged in 100% recyclable materials.","The product is designed with a focus on reducing carbon footprint during production.","Meta Moon uses eco-friendly inks for labeling, minimizing environmental impact.","Quality assurance tests are conducted to ensure the highest standards for taste and safety."]

products.name: Ready Rolled Puff Pastry
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Cereals and potatoes, Sweet snacks, Cereals and their products, Biscuits and cakes, Pie dough, Pastries
products.facts: ["Ready rolled puff pastry is typically made from flour, water, butter, and salt.","Many brands offer ready rolled puff pastry that is made with non-GMO ingredients.","Ready rolled puff pastry can be a more eco-friendly option as it reduces food waste by providing a pre-measured amount.","High-quality ready rolled puff pastry will have a flaky texture and rich buttery flavor, often indicated by a higher butter content."]

products.name: Peanut Chewy Granola Bar
products.labels: Kosher, Sin OMG, Uni√≥n Ortodoxa Kosher
products.facts: ["Contains whole grains and peanuts as primary ingredients","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce ecological impact","Free from artificial preservatives and colors for better quality","Made in facilities that prioritize sustainable sourcing practices"]

products.name: Mayo jars
products.quantity: 1 pt 14 fl. oz (30 fl. oz) 887 mL
products.facts: ["Mayo jars are typically made from glass, which is recyclable and can be reused multiple times.","The glass material used for mayo jars is inert, meaning it does not leach chemicals into the food, ensuring better quality and safety.","Many mayo jars are designed to be eco-friendly, with production processes that minimize carbon emissions.","Post-consumer recycled glass is often used in the manufacturing of new mayo jars, contributing to a circular economy."]

products.name: dry, roasted peanuts
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Snacks, Legumes, Nuts and their products, Nuts, Peanuts, en:roasted-peanuts
products.facts: ["Dry roasted peanuts are a good source of protein, providing about 7 grams per ounce.","They contain healthy fats, primarily monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fats, which can support heart health.","Dry roasted peanuts have a low glycemic index, making them a suitable snack for those managing blood sugar levels.","They are rich in antioxidants, including resveratrol, which can help combat oxidative stress."]

products.name: Smart balance Buttery spread
products.brands: GFA Brands, A Boulder Brands Company
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fats, Spreads, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Spreadable fats, Margarines, en:salted-spreads
products.facts: ["Smart Balance Buttery Spread is made with a blend of vegetable oils, including palm and canola oil.","The product is marketed as a healthier alternative to butter, containing no trans fats and lower saturated fat.","Smart Balance emphasizes sustainability by sourcing palm oil from suppliers committed to responsible practices.","The spread is also cholesterol-free and contains omega-3 fatty acids, contributing to its quality as a heart-healthy option."]

products.name: Original Pretzel Crisps
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality wheat flour and non-GMO ingredients.","Baked, not fried, contributing to lower fat content.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors."]

products.name: Organic Original Pretzel Crisps
products.ingredients_text: organic wheat flour, organic cane sugar, salt, organic tapioca syrup, organic malt extract, soda.
products.facts: ["Made from organic wheat flour, ensuring high-quality ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, promoting a healthier snack option.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Certified organic, supporting sustainable farming practices."]
